::WarMachine/Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer::

WarMachine takes a step back to steady himself as the charge hits him, making 
another dent in his armor.

He roars as he looks down at Mobster, firing two missiles at him along with a 
dozen rapid shots from his shoulder guns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus dives again, a few autogun shots hitting him, much more missing 
barely. He was starting to leak mech fluid.

His eyes narrow as he aims his launcher, firing it at one of the bigger 
autoguns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike stops in the forest, being able to see a few of the autoguns 
through the trees. Pulling up his missile launcher, he fires a missile at the 
autoguns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica stabalizes in the air, a few feet above the canopy and out of range 
of most of the shots. Seeing Zardus fire on the autoguns, Reptilica does the 
same, two missiles flying at the Mafia base's autoguns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Excited at weaponfire, DevilDuer runs forward, stopping when he gets a 
transmission from Zardus.

"DevilDuer," the transmission reads, "Can you go back to the Alliance base, 
and get any wounded into the CR chambers? Take any of their wounded and put 
them in stasis lock during and after repair."

DevilDuer sighs, putting away his rifle.

"I have to go back to base," he says over his comm to Najah, "Stay here and 
fight if ya want, I'll see ya back at base."

He turns around, running off toward the Alliance base.
